topic.title: INTERPRETER PRESENT AT CARE CONTACT INDICATION CODE
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether an interpreter was present at a CARE CONTACT for the purposes of communication, including Sign Language, between a CARE PROFESSIONAL and a PATIENT or Patient Proxy and if so the type of interpreter.
